AboutPage.title: The Birth of Seder
AboutPage.subtitle: Seder was born from a word — and a path.
AboutPage.p1: Beyond the acronym of my initials — Skouri David Raphaël — Seder (סדר) embodies a fundamental philosophy: that of Order. The idea that even what seems complex — a relationship, a decision, an event, a project — can become clear, structured, mastered. And above all: peaceful.
AboutPage.p2: My journey was built on a dual requirement, at the highest level: artistic requirement and business requirement.
AboutPage.p3: I am an artist, an Andalusian singer of Moroccan origin, a Hazan, and a performer for religiously connoted events. And a great artist is never “simply” an artist: he already lives in rigor, precision, detail, mastery of emotion and execution. It is this artistic discipline that prepared me to understand excellence — and then to transpose it into the business world.
AboutPage.p4: Because I was very present in the community, and because my relationships were naturally built in circles of influence, I was gradually entrusted with responsibilities that went far beyond the stage. I was asked to organize events (weddings, bar/bat mitzvahs, celebrations), to manage situations where everything had to be perfect, discreet, fluid. I was also entrusted with responsibilities related to real estate: apartments to manage, service providers to coordinate, decisions to take. And over time, I also took charge of everything related to hospitality, concierge services, and lifestyle: welcoming, foreseeing, securing, anticipating, ensuring that life was simple for very demanding people.
AboutPage.p5: These experiences gave me a central competence: a real organizational capacity, forged in the field, in contact with very high standards — in events, hospitality, concierge services, and real estate.
AboutPage.p6: I lived for several years in the United States, which expanded my network and strengthened my learning. Initially, these doors opened out of kindness: they saw me as an artist. Then the relationship became much deeper: I was given total trust, missions, decisions to make, sometimes even the management of entire teams during their travels. I learned business from people who succeeded — by integrating their method, their mentality, their standards.
AboutPage.p7: In parallel, my place at the heart of the community also put me at the center of human dilemmas, sometimes very tense. I often played the role of mediator: calming, understanding, restoring trust, finding a fair outcome, and creating an agreement. This capacity led me to study and understand the psychology of relations, decisions, and power dynamics — a fundamental pillar of what I have become.
AboutPage.p8: It is exactly this that gave birth to Seder: the rare synthesis between artistic excellence, business requirement, event organization, hospitality/lifestyle concierge, real estate, and mediation.
AboutPage.p9: Today, in Israel, I am solicited for these same reasons: reliability, discretion, ability to move forward, and aptitude to deliver a result in contexts where many fail. Seder Group is not an idea: it is the culmination of a real experience, structured into a union capable of serving — and achieving — at the highest level.
AboutPage.closing: With Seder, bring order to your life.

metadata.title: Seder Events | Luxury Wedding Planner & Bar Mitzvah Kotel
metadata.description: Organizing exceptional events in Israel. Prestige weddings, Bar Mitzvah at the Kotel, and bespoke corporate events by Seder Group.

EventsPage.title: Seder Events
EventsPage.intro: Seder Events is the event house of Seder Group: a department dedicated to the creation, artistic direction, and execution of events designed to mark a lifetime.
EventsPage.approach: Our approach is not limited to 'organizing'. We orchestrate: concept design, storytelling, scenography, partner selection, planning, field coordination, contingency management, and millimeter-precise execution — so the client experiences their moment, not their logistics.
EventsPage.conclusion: Each project is treated as a bespoke piece: from the first intention to the last minute of the evening, with a team that pilots, secures, and sublimates.

brands.kotel_event: Premium religious and private celebrations at the Western Wall.

metadata.title: Seder UHNWI | Family Office & Lifestyle Management Israel
metadata.description: Ultra-private services for UHNWI. Wealth management, close protection, and exclusive access to luxury properties in Israel.

UHNWIPage.title: Seder UHNWI
UHNWIPage.intro: Seder UHNWI is the most exclusive department of Seder Group, designed for an Ultra High Net Worth clientele that demands a level of service comparable to the best international houses.
UHNWIPage.service_desc: Here, everything is ultra-personalized, confidential, and frictionless. We operate as a private conductor: lifestyle management, bespoke travel, access, hospitality, rare experiences, and prestigious events — with total mastery of execution, detail, and protocol.
UHNWIPage.promise_desc: A discreet but total presence. Anticipation, precision, network, high standards — and above all, an ability to deliver what is not accessible to the common: the right place, the right person, the right timing, the right execution.
UHNWIPage.conclusion: Seder UHNWI is a universe apart within the Seder ecosystem and depends on no other platform.

brands.uhnwi: Exclusive event planning for Ultra-High-Net-Worth Individuals.

metadata.title: Seder Music | Music Production & Luxury Orchestras Israel
metadata.description: Musical excellence for your events. Symphony orchestras, live bands, and bespoke sound production for weddings and galas in Israel.

MusicPage.title: Seder Music
MusicPage.intro: Seder Music is a production, booking, and influence house designed to play in the league of global benchmarks. From Israel, at the crossroads of the Middle East and international scenes, we connect talents, brands, and institutions with a rare level of requirement: artistic direction, negotiation, contracting, executive production, global logistics, and staging — right up to final execution.
MusicPage.value_prop: Our power rests on a triple value:
MusicPage.point1: Star Booking & Premium Productions: access and orchestration of very high-level performances, guaranteeing impeccable execution, high technical standards, and absolute discretion.
MusicPage.point2: Influence & Activation: we turn talent audiences into high-performing content that drives measurable results.
MusicPage.point3: R&D Records Label — The Stars of Tomorrow: beyond the headliners, we detect and develop rising talents, accompany them artistically, and structure their rise to power to create the icons of the next generation.

brands.seder_music: Discover our roster and latest releases.

metadata.title: Seder Business | Corporate Concierge & Lifestyle Manager Israel
metadata.description: Exclusive B2B services and wealth management. Corporate concierge, real estate consulting, and VIP relocation in Tel Aviv and Jerusalem.

BusinessPage.title: Seder Business
BusinessPage.intro: Seder Business is the strategic mediation and deal-making arm of Seder Group. Our value lies not in 'consulting', but in a rare capability: unlocking what is blocked, securing what is sensitive, and leading complex situations to a concrete outcome.
BusinessPage.mediation_desc: We intervene where exchanges are tense, interests diverge, and trust is fragile. Our signature is resolution engineering: transforming a problem into a solution with method, discretion, and high standards.
BusinessPage.network_desc: When a company faces a critical gap, we know how to identify and approach the right people. We operate as a trusted operator: analysis, strategy, targeting, and finalization.
BusinessPage.realty_desc: Specialization in Jerusalem real estate and integrated concierge services. We manage the entire chain: profitability, operations, administration, and coordination, with the same rigor.

brands.consulting: Expert guidance on market penetration and growth.
brands.conciergerie: Luxury lifestyle management and corporate solutions.
